title: Define expectations
content: We start by clarifying your business needs and requirements, general regulations, and conditions. This information lets us decide on the expertise, skillset, and team size needed for your project.

title: Form a dedicated team of high-quality experts
content: We build a devoted team of top-notch experts who work exclusively on your business success. Moreover, we can quickly scale your team if you need additional specialists.

title: Begin the collaboration and onboarding
content: Once we form a dedicated team, we move directly to our cooperation. We set up calls and daily meetings to keep you informed about the current project progress and ensure regular reporting.

title: Start the development process
content: We provide a fully transparent development process along with convenient tools to communicate. You’ll collaborate directly with our Project Manager and the team to track the project’s progress.

title: Enjoy a hassle-free development process
content: We take care of all administration related to your dedicated team, such as salary packages, bookkeeping, sick leaves, days off, vacations, legal documentation, and training programs.
